feed.title: Google Cloud: Batch
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Batch

entry.content: Pub/Sub might not send notifications for all intermediate states when a job or task changes very quickly. You can mitigate this issue by viewing state history through status events. For more information, see Known issues.
entry.summary: Pub/Sub may miss notifications for rapid job/task state changes. View status events for state history.
entry.title: Issue: Pub/Sub Notification Issue
